Layout animations: add layout prop to motion components
Enter/exit: wrap with AnimatePresence, use initial/animate/exit props

namingConventions.components: PascalCase with Widget suffix for dashboard widgets

projectSpecificRules: Backend wraps responses in { data, success } format
Use better-sqlite3 synchronous API for simplicity
Vite proxy forwards /api to backend port
Dark amber accent colors (#b45309, #d97706) with black text for contrast
Noir palette for backgrounds (noir-950 to noir-500)

successfulApproaches.task: Build React frontend with 5 widget components
successfulApproaches.approach: Created modular components with shared WidgetCard, Button, Modal. Used Tailwind for styling with custom theme. Implemented localStorage fallback for all data widgets.

successfulApproaches.task: Build Express backend with SQLite database
successfulApproaches.approach: Used better-sqlite3 for synchronous DB operations. Created separate route files for each resource. Implemented validation utilities and custom error classes.

Implemented Crystalline Noir design system with Outfit/DM Sans fonts, noir color palette, and dark amber accents. Added motion.dev animations to all 8 components including whileHover/whileTap, AnimatePresence for modals/lists, layout animations, and spring physics. Used black text on amber elements for contrast.

Updated all 4 widget modals with consistent input styling (bg-white/[0.06], border-white/10, amber focus rings). Added Cancel buttons with secondary variant. Standardized form spacing to space-y-5. Fixed date input dark mode with [color-scheme:dark].
